SEAI indicated at Climate Cttee today that they expect 7,500 deep retrofits to be completed in 2022 by end of year.   To meet 2030 target >60,000 a year are needed…

SEAI confirmed to me at Climate Committee today that they do not collect data on the tenancy type of applicants, so they have no way of telling if any of their schemes are being availed of for tenants in the private rented sector. Quite incredible.
